short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start your day with wisdom from the Bhagavad Gita

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Immerse yourself in timeless wisdom with our Bhagavad Gita Daily Wisdom extension. This unique browser add-on transforms your daily internet experience into a journey of spiritual insight and self-reflection. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with:

A carefully selected quote from the revered Hindu scripture, the Bhagavad Gita, presented in both Sanskrit and English.
The current date and time, keeping you oriented in your day.
A personalized greeting based on the time of day.
Your life progress information, including the number of days you've lived and your life progress percentage assuming 75 years life expectancy, offering a unique perspective on your journey.

The extension features a serene and elegant design with a dynamic gradient background that complements the profound nature of the quotes, creating a harmonious browsing environment. You can easily share your favorite quotes on Twitter with a single click.
Whether you're a devoted follower of Hindu philosophy or simply seeking daily inspiration, our Bhagavad Gita Daily Wisdom extension offers moments of contemplation amidst your digital activities while helping you stay mindful of your life's journey."
